io.vertx.core.streams

Interface StreamBase

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AmqpReceiver, AmqpSender, AsyncFile, BodyStream<T>, CassandraRowStream, DatagramSocket, HttpClientRequest, HttpClientResponse, HttpServerFileUpload, HttpServerRequest, HttpServerResponse, JsonParser, KafkaConsumer<K,V>, KafkaProducer<K,V>, KafkaReadStream<K,V>, KafkaWriteStream<K,V>, MessageConsumer<T>, NetSocket, PgChannel, RabbitMQConsumer, ReactiveReadStream<T>, ReactiveWriteStream<T>, ReadStream<T>, RecordParser, RedisConnection, RowStream<T>, ServerWebSocket, SockJSSocket, SQLRowStream, TestSuiteReport, TimeoutStream, WebSocket, WebSocketBase, WriteStream<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GrpcWriteStream, ReadStreamSubscriber

    public interface StreamBase
    Base interface for a stream.
    Author:
    Tim Fox
